00024 template <class Base>
00025 class TModelWrap: public iser::TCopySerializedWrap<Base>, public imod::CModelBase
00026 {
00027 public:
00028        typedef iser::TCopySerializedWrap<Base> BaseClass;
00029        typedef imod::CModelBase BaseClass2;
00030 
00031        void SetBaseObject(const Base& baseObject);
00032 
00033        // pseudo-reimplemented (istd::IChangeable)
00034        virtual int GetSupportedOperations() const;
00035        virtual istd::IChangeable* CloneMe() const;
00036

00038        // pseudo-reimplemented (istd::IChangeable)

00046 template <class Base>
00047 void TModelWrap<Base>::SetBaseObject(const Base& baseObject)
00048 {
00049        Base::operator=(baseObject);
00050 }
00051 
00052 
00053 // pseudo-reimplemented (istd::IChangeable)
00054 
00055 template <class Base>
00056 int TModelWrap<Base>::GetSupportedOperations() const
00057 {
00058        int baseOperations = Base::GetSupportedOperations();
00059 
00060        if ((baseOperations & istd::IChangeable::SO_COPY) != 0){
00061               return baseOperations | istd::IChangeable::SO_CLONE | istd::IChangeable::SO_OBSERVE;
00062        }
00063        else{
00064               return baseOperations | istd::IChangeable::SO_OBSERVE;
00065        }
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 template <class Base>
00070 istd::IChangeable* TModelWrap<Base>::CloneMe() const
00071 {
00072        istd::TDelPtr< TModelWrap<Base> > clonePtr(new TModelWrap<Base>());
00073 
00074        if (clonePtr->CopyFrom(*this)){
00075               return clonePtr.PopPtr();
00076        }
00077 
00078        return NULL;
00079 }

00086 template <class Base>
00087 void TModelWrap<Base>::OnBeginChanges(int changeFlags, istd::IPolymorphic* changeParamsPtr)
00088 {
00089        BaseClass::OnBeginChanges(changeFlags, changeParamsPtr);
00090 
00091        NotifyBeforeUpdate(changeFlags, changeParamsPtr);
00092 }
